item.title: About
item.description: I’m a software engineer at ozon.ru in Moscow. Here I am working in a team as a Go backend engineer.My background is in computer science, I did my undergrad at Saint-Petersburg State University. I did my thesis with JetBrains lab of AI tools for IntelliJ IDEA, and at the same time, I worked in a few part-time jobs-startups.After the university, I wanted to develop highly distributed systems and joined a game company as a Python engineer.
